thread.title: Cops investigating after dog is shot 9 times with pellet gun - Massachusetts news
thread.title_full: Cops investigating after dog is shot 9 times with pellet gun - Massachusetts news

author: boston.com
title: Cops investigating after dog is shot 9 times with pellet gun - Massachusetts news
text:
ROCHESTER, Mass. (AP) â€” Police in southeastern Massachusetts are investigating after a dog was shot eight or nine times with a pellet gun.
The owner tells WCVB-TV he let the dog outside Wednesday morning in Rochester and found him later that day in a nearby cemetery. He says he saw blood as he went to pet four-year-old Noble, and the dog had visible marks all over his body from the pellets.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Rochester Police and the owner of the chocolate lab say the shooting was intentional.
WHDH-TV reports the man is not considering surgery to remove all of the pellets, which is expensive. A veterinarian said no organs were hit though, and the lab should be able to recover.
